definitions.title: II.
definitions.body: of God: kindness, lovingkindness in condescendig to the needs of his creatures. He is [[חַסְדָּס]] their goodness favour Jon 2:9; [[חַסְדִּי]] Ps 144:2; [[אֱלֽהֵי חַסְדִּי]] God of my kindness Ps 59:18; in v:Ps 59:11 rd. [[אֱלֽהַי חַסְדּוֹ]] my God with his kindness LXX Vulgate Ew Hup De Pe Che Bae; his is the kindness Ps 62:13; it is with him Ps 130:7; he delights in it Mic 7:18.
specif. lovingkindness:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: in redemption from enemies and troubles Ge 19:19, Ge 39:21 (J), Ex 15:13 (song), Je 31:3, Ezr 7:28, Ezr 9:9, Ps 21:8, Ps 31:17, Ps 31:22, Ps 32:10, Ps 33:22, Ps 36:8, Ps 36:11, Ps 42:9, Ps 44:27, Ps 48:10, Ps 59:17, Ps 66:20, Ps 85:8, Ps 90:14, Ps 94:18, Ps 107:8, Ps 107:15, Ps 107:21, Ps 107:31, Ps 143:8, Ps 143:12, Job 37:13, Ru 1:8, Ru 2:20; men should trust in it Ps 13:6, Ps 52:8; rejoice in it Ps 31:8; hope in it Ps 33:18; Ps 147:11.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in preservation of life from death Ps 6:5, Ps 86:13, Job 10:12.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: in quickening of spiritual life Ps 109:26, Ps 119:41, Ps 119:76, Ps 119:88, Ps 119:124, Ps 119:149, Ps 119:159.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: in redemption from sin Ps 25:7, Ps 51:3.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: in keeping the covenants, with Abraham Mic 7:20; with Moses and Israel [[חֶסֶד]]([[הַ]])[[שׁמר הַבְּרִית וְ]] keep-eth the covenant and the lovingkindness De 7:9, De 7:12, 1Ki 8:23 = 2Ch 6:14, Ne 1:5, Ne 9:32, Da 9:4; with David and his dynasty 2Sa 7:15 = 1Ch 17:13, 2Sa 22:51 = Ps 18:51, 1Ki 3:6, 1Ki 3:6 = 2Ch 1:8, Ps 89:29, Ps 89:34; with the wife Zion Is 54:10.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: great in extent: ´[[נּׁדֶל חִ]] greatness of thy mercy Nu 14:19 (J); ´[[נְּדָוֹ֠לאח]] Ps 145:8; it is kept for thousands Ex 34:7 (JE), Je 32:18, esp. of those connected with lovers of ´[[י]], Ex 20:6 = De 5:10; for 1000 generations De 7:9; it is great as the heavens Ps 57:11, Ps 103:11, cf. Ps 36:6, Ps 108:5; the earth is full of it Ps 33:5, Ps 119:64.
